channel.title: Bias on Bryan Schafroth Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Bias on Bryan Schafroth Portfolio

item.title: Agorithm Bias in Analysis
item.description: The term “bias” concerning an analysis of population data concerning machine learning and predictive analytic algorithms can result in bias, and that would be a bit more in-depth for this discussion. According to Bruce and Bruce (2017), the bias seen in statistical measurement or sampling errors is likely due to the process of measurement and sampling methods. Bias may be observable or invisible and detected by referencing or benchmarking values.
